subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
Houston Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Lexi Thompson closed with a bogey-free four-under 68 at the Kraft Nabisco Championship, becoming the second-youngest major winner in L.P.G.A. Tour history at 19 years 1 month 27 days.
snippet: Lexi Thompson closed with a bogey-free four-under 68 at the Kraft Nabisco Championship, becoming the second-youngest major winner in L.P.G.A. Tour history at 19 years 1 month 27 days.
